name: DualMania!: Universes Connect
description:
This is a game created for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam where your inputs control two different mini-games at once: on the left side of the screen, a top-down maze-like game. On the right side, a shmup where you lose health if the enemy ships touch you.   

On the left side, you can press space to toggle between parallel universes where the obstacles are different. When you complete a level by getting to the yellow dot, you add 1 health to the other side.  

On the right side, you can press space to shoot at enemies and prevent them from touching you. If you lose all your health, the game is over on both sides.  

CONTROLS: 

Right Side: 

Space to shoot 

W accelerate 

A turn left 

D turn right  

Left Side: 

Space to toggle between universes 

W move up 

A move left 

S move down 

D move right  

This game was made in 2 hours and 15 minutes.

Credit to jsplding and sawsquarenoise for the music

EDIT: Just counted and there is 359 lines of code!

Devlog:

1.1 Made significantly easier

1.2 Added main menu music

1.3 Fixed balance and collision on left side

Just so you know the restart button at the top right causes bugs. If you want to play again after a game over reload the page.
